verses.esv: 44 For behold, when the sound of your greeting came to my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy.
verses.kjv: 44 For, lo, as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears, the babe leaped in my womb for joy.
verses.niv: 44 As soon as the sound of your greeting reached my ears, the baby in my womb leaped for joy.

verses.esv: 41 And when Elizabeth heard the greeting of Mary, the baby leaped in her womb. And Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit,
verses.kjv: 41 And it came to pass, that, when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary, the babe leaped in her womb; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost:
verses.niv: 41 When Elizabeth heard Mary's greeting, the baby leaped in her womb, and Elizabeth was filled with the Holy Spirit.

verses.esv:
5   “Before I formed you in the womb I knew you,
  and before you were born I consecrated you;
  I appointed you a prophet to the nations.”
verses.kjv: 5 Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee; and before thou camest forth out of the womb I sanctified thee, and I ordained thee a prophet unto the nations.
verses.niv: 5 "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart; I appointed you as a prophet to the nations."

verses.esv: 2:1 First of all, then, I urge that supplications, prayers, intercessions, and thanksgivings be made for all people,
verses.kjv: 1 I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
verses.niv: 1 I urge, then, first of all, that requests, prayers, intercession and thanksgiving be made for everyone--

verses.esv: 30 He must increase, but I must decrease.”
verses.kjv: 30 He must increase, but I must decrease.
verses.niv: 30 He must become greater; I must become less.

verses.esv: 19 Again I say to you, if two of you agree on earth about anything they ask, it will be done for them by my Father in heaven.
verses.kjv: 19 Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.
verses.niv: 19 "Again, I tell you that if two of you on earth agree about anything you ask for, it will be done for you by my Father in heaven.

verses.esv: 2 during the high priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas, the word of God came to John the son of Zechariah in the wilderness.
verses.kjv: 2 Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests, the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness.
verses.niv: 2 during the high priesthood of Annas and Caiaphas, the word of God came to John son of Zechariah in the desert.

verses.esv:
To the choirmaster. A Psalm of David.

19:1   The heavens declare the glory of God,
    and the sky above proclaims his handiwork.
verses.kjv: 1 The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
verses.niv: 1 The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.
